doc.title: Tokyo Eats Part 1: Daikokuya: Tendon in Asakusa
doc.text: Many/JJ kakis/NNS have/VBP requested/VBN to/TO the/DT pics/NNS of/IN what/WP I/PRP ate/VBD in/IN my/PRP$ recent/JJ trip/NN to/TO Tokyo/NN ,/, so/RB I/PRP have/VB decided/VBD to/TO post/VB some/NN of/IN the/DT highlights/NN over/IN the/DT next/JJ few/JJ weeks/NNS ./. The/DT reason/NN that/IN I/PRP have/VBP been/VBN resistant/RB in/IN posting/VBG my/PRP$ Tokyo/NN pictures/NN was/VBD because/IN I/PRP thought/VBD that/IN it/PRP might/VB be/VB a/DT little/JJ frustrating/NN to/TO look/VB at/IN something/NN delicious/JJ and/CC not/RB be/VB able/JJ to/TO easily/RB just/RB go/VB down/VB to/TO that/WDT stall/NN and/CC eat/VB it/PRP ./. However/RB ,/, I/PRP know/VB that/WDT Japanese/NN food/NN is/VBZ currently/RB very/RB popular/JJ in/IN Singapore/NNP and/CC that/IN a/DT lot/NN of/IN our/JJ readers/NNS actually/RB travel/VBN so/IN this/DT series/NN of/IN posts/NNS may/MD be/VB useful/NN for/IN everyone/NN to/TO reminesce/VB about/IN their/PRP$ own/JJ experiences/NN in/IN Tokyo/NN as/IN well/RB as/IN to/TO recommend/VB other/JJ great/JJ eats/NN there/RB ./.
